//The QR QRScanner ZXing Scanner - Full Activity ZXing Scanner - Full Fragment Activity ZXing Scanner - Simple Activity ZXing Scanner - Simple Fragment Activity Simple Activity Sample Simple Fragment Sample Full Activity Sample Full Fragment Sample Flash Flash [ON] Flash [OFF] Auto Focus [ON] Auto Focus [OFF] Formats Choose Formats Select a Camera OK Cancel //End QR BreadWallet address Settings MainActivity ScanResultActivity DecoderActivity TestQRActivity IntroShowPhrase is not a valid phrase rescan blockchain if you think you may have missing transactions, or are having trouble sending (rescanning can take several minutes) Enter this wallet's recovery phrase to wipe it and start/recover another. Your current balance remains on this phrase if you ever lose your phone, you will need this phrase to recovery your wallet
Let others scan this QR code to get your bitcoin address. Anyone can send bitcoins to your wallet by transferring them to your address This is your bitcoin address. Tap to copy it or send it by email or sms. The address will change each time you receive funds, but old addresses always work Press again to exit! No internet connection WARNING DO NOT let anyone see your recovery phrase or they can spend your bitcoins. 

NEVER type your recovery phrase into password managers or elsewhere.
Other devices may be infected.

DO NOT take a screenshot.
Screenshots are visible to other apps and devices. show cancel Alert "clipboard doesn't contain a valid bitcoin address

n%1$s close invalid payment request unknown host connection timed out payment request expired something went wrong moreâ€¦ sent: %1$s send received: %1$s wallet address payment address spent address bitcoin network fee payment info pay address from clipboard scan QR code request an amount send address as email send address as message copy address to clipboard chose a passcode enter passcode Scan someone else's QR code to get their bitcoin address. A bitcoin address always starts with '1' or '3'. recover address already in your wallet! syncing... couldn't make payment ADDRESS ALREADY USED
bitcoin addresses are intended for single use only
re-use reduces privacy for both you and the recipient and can result in loss if the recipient doesn't directly control the address ignore
